Configuring Media Tree¶

TODO

You can define the following settings in your settings.py:

media_tree.defaults.MEDIA_TREE_SWFUPLOADMEDIA_TREE_SWFUPLOAD¶

List of mimetypes not convered by the mimetypes Python module (for instance, .flv is not guessed by guess_mimetype.)
